name: Shoujo City
description: Shoujo City is a dating simulator game, set in virtual 3D Tokyo and focused on anime and otaku culture.
minimum_requirements: İşletim Sistemi: Windows XP İşlemci: Intel Core i3-3220 Bellek: 2 GB RAM Ekran Kartı: Intel HD Graphics 4000 Depolama: 500 MB kullanılabilir alan
recommended_requirements: Önerilen: İşletim Sistemi: Windows 7 İşlemci: Intel Core i5-6500 Bellek: 4 GB RAM Ekran Kartı: Intel HD 530 Depolama: 1 GB kullanılabilir alan
